bill.title: Relating To Irrigation.
bill.description: Clarifies that the BOA has the power to acquire property by eminent domain for the construction and maintenance of water facilities that convey, distribute, and transmit water for agricultural uses, but not for domestic use. Amends the definition of "public utility" to exclude entities that convey, transmit, and distribute nonpotable water. Takes effect on 1/7/2059. (SD1)

history.action: Introduced and Pass First Reading.
Referred to WAL/AGR, CPC, referral sheet 6
Re-referred to WAL, CPC, referral sheet 8
Bill scheduled to be heard by WAL on Wednesday, 02-08-17 9:00AM in House conference room 325.

The committees on WAL recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamane, Kong, Cullen, Evans, Ichiyama, C. Lee, Lowen, Say, Fukumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from WAL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 566) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to CPC.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on CPC with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) DeCoite, Tokioka excused (2).
Bill scheduled to be heard by CPC on Tuesday, 02-28-17 2:00PM in House conference room 329.

The committees on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) McKelvey, Ito, Say, Takayama, Todd, Yamane, Fukumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Ichiyama, Aquino.

Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-07-17.
Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Ichiyama excused (1). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 363).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to AEN/CPH, JDL/WAM.
The committee(s) on AEN/CPH has scheduled a public hearing on 03-20-17 1:15PM in conference room 224.

The committee(s) on AEN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in AEN were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Gabbard, Nishihara, K. Rhoads; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Riviere, Ruderman ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.

The committee(s) on JDL/WAM will hold a public decision making on 03-30-17 9:50AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 8 Aye(s): Senator(s) Tokuda, Dela Cruz, Galuteria, Harimoto, Inouye, Taniguchi, Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Riviere ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) English, K. Kahele, Shimabukuro.
Reported from JDL/WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1464) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 1).
